PAYMENTS.KPP:
KPP - taxpayer registration reason code

KPP consists of 9 characters (numbers)
PAYMENTS.OKTMO: OKTMO (All-Russian Classifier of Territories of Municipal Formations) is a code assigned to the territory of a municipality or a settlement that is part of it
PAYMENTS.BUDGET:
The value of the tax period indicator has 10 characters in the format DD.MM.YYYY

«DD»,- payment frequency;
«MC» - monthly payments;
«KB»- quarterly payments;
«PL»- semi-annual payments;
«GD» - annual payments;

«01»-«31» - a calendar day.
«MM» - month / quarter / half year of the reporting year.
«YYYY» - Year for which payment is made.

Month number - from 01 to 12
Quarter number - from 01 to 04
Half year number - 01 or 02
Annual payment - 00
PAYMENTS.KBE:
Frequently used:

LLP - 17
IE or individual - 19
Foreign company - 27

Value:

The first digit is the residence code recipient:
1 - resident of the RK
2 - non-resident of the RK

The second digit - the sector of the economy, to which the recipient belongs:
1 - Central government
2 - Regional and local governments
3 - Central (national) banks
4 - Other depository authorities
5 - Other financial organizations
6 - State non-financial organizations
7 - Non-state non-financial organizations
8 - Non-profit organizations
9 - Households

LISTS.DESCRIPTION1: Free payments in tenge and volumes of deposits and withdrawals apply to the following cancellation fee for the package. The validity date of the package can be viewed on the screen 'My package'. Transaction fees that are not indicated in the Collect your package or are not connected in the package are charged according to the Standard tariffs.
LISTS.DESCRIPTION2: If you don't have enough payments in the package before the next renewal of the package, you can buy a one-time additional package. Click on the icon > and buy the quantity you need. Payments for the additional package will be transferred after the extension of the main package. Also with deposits and withdrawals.
LISTS.DESCRIPTION3: And you can also enable and disable discounts on transfers in rubles and in foreign currency without changing the main package. The commission for activating the discount will be recalculated taking into account the remaining duration of the package.

LISTS.DESCRIPTION1:
From 1,000 to 35,000 tenge per month - depending on the selected services.

The payment is debited immediately after activation and then monthly on the same date. If the payment day falls on a weekend or holiday, the debit will occur on the next business day. If there are not enough funds on the current account, the package is automatically disabled, and the terms of the Standard tariff will apply.
LISTS.DESCRIPTION2:
The package balances are not carried over to the next period, are not returned and are not counted against future payments, including in the following cases:
  • switching to the Standard tariff;
  • changing the set of services in the package;
  • closing accounts before the expiration of the service period.
The limits are valid for one month from the date of activation. If you want to change the composition of the package, we recommend connecting a new one 1-2 days before the date of debiting.

The option 'Withdrawal and deposit of cash' provides for the amount of cash in tenge.

SALE.TITLE: Discounts on transfers in foreign currency

RUBLES.TITLE: In rubles
RUBLES.DESCRIPTION: 0.1% from a transfer amount instead of 0.2%</br> minimum commission - 2,000 ₸, maximum - 30,000 ₸

ANOTHER_CURRENCY.TITLE: In another currency
ANOTHER_CURRENCY.DESCRIPTION:
Usual
0.2% from transfer amount instead of 0.3%
minimum commission - 10 000 ₸, maximum - 80 000 ₸

Guaranteed
0.25% from transfer amount instead of 0.35%
minimum commission - 20 000 ₸, maximum - 100 000 ₸

UNK.TITLE: Appointment of CTN and conversion - free

LISTS.DESCRIPTION: Includes the entire amount of work with cash, both withdrawal from the account and its replenishment
Commission for payments in branches and after 04:00 p.m is charged according to the tariffs “Standard”

LISTS.DESCRIPTION1: Дополнительный пакет доступен сразу после подключения. При продлении основного пакета неиспользованные платежи дополнительного пакета переносятся на следующий месяц. При отключении основного пакета все неиспользованные платежи сгорают.
LISTS.DESCRIPTION2: Несколько дополнительных пакетов одновременно купить нельзя, следующий будет доступен после использования первого.

LISTS.DESCRIPTION1: Дополнительный пакет доступен сразу после подключения. При продлении основного пакета неиспользованные объемы пополнения и снятия дополнительного пакета переносятся на следующий месяц. При отключении основного пакета все неиспользованные пополнения и снятия сгорают.
LISTS.DESCRIPTION2: Несколько дополнительных пакетов одновременно купить нельзя, следующий будет доступен после использования первого.

LISTS.DESCRIPTION1: Сначала расходуются платежи и объемы пополнений и снятий по основному пакету, после их окончания начнут расходоваться по дополнительному.
LISTS.DESCRIPTION2: Чтобы купить еще один дополнительный пакет, надо потратить ранее купленный.

AGREEMENT.ENTREPRENEUR:
Continuing I
permit authorized bank to provide information on this payment and (or) money transfer in law enforcement agencies of the Republic of Kazakhstan and (or) the National Bank;

I confirm that this payment and (or) money transfer is not related to execution of the Currency Contract under which it is required to receive tracking number (for residents);

I confirm, that this payment and (or) money transfer is not related to funding of the terroristic or extremism activities or by other method for support of the terrorism or extremism.
AGREEMENT.CORPORATE: Continuing, I confirm, that money transfer is not related to execution of the Currency Contract under which it is required to appoint a tracking number.

AML.ALERT: The operation will take longer to process

MAIN_MODAL.CONTENT: All international transfers and transfers between residents and non-residents may be delayed for up to two days by AML verification
MAIN_MODAL.TITLE: AML Checks

WARNING_MODAL.CONTENT:
We hereby inform you that in connection with the order of the President of the Republic of Kazakhstan Tokayev K. on strengthening the control of cross-border payments/transfers, your operation will be approved by the Head Bank.

Amount will be temporarily blocked until the operation is completed. The possibility of the operation will be announced later.

We apologize for the inconvenience!
WARNING_MODAL.TITLE: Dear customer!

ADD_CONTRACT_MODAL.HEADING: Add Contract/document
ADD_CONTRACT_MODAL.DESCRIPTION:
Size of one file cannot exceed 5 MB.
Formats: PDF, JPG, JPEG, DOC, PNG, TIF.
ADD_CONTRACT_MODAL.AGREEMENT:
Continuing, I confirm,
- that I agree to receive a tracking number to assigned Currency Contract that has a relation to export or import of the goods , and I was notified on terms of receipt of a tracking number ;
- that subject to absence of total sum of the Contract, to fulfill an accounting registration of the Contract with reference amount of 50,000.01 USD (for increase in sum it is necessary to send a letter in the bank);
- that in case of successful verification of the Contract a commission will be charged as per my tariff plan.
ADD_CONTRACT_MODAL.COMMISSION_HELPER: Commission will be withdrawn based on your plan

PAYMENTS.TITLE: Access to payments
PAYMENTS.DESCRIPTION: If the user is denied access to a payment category, he will not be able to create payments for this category. An amount limit can be set for an open category.

MESSAGES.LIMIT_DELETE_FAILED: The limit on «{{PaymentType}}» could not be deleted

CREATE.PENSION: to Set a limit on the amount of pension payment
CREATE.SOCIAL: to Set a limit on the amount for social security payment
CREATE.MEDICAL: to Set a limit on the amount for medical payment
CREATE.TAX: to Set a limit on the amount of the tax payment
CREATE.SALARY: to Set a limit on the amount for the salary payment
CREATE.IN_BETWEEN: to Set a limit on the amount for payment between your accounts
CREATE.CONVERSION: Set a limit on the amount for currency conversion
CREATE.FOREIGN: Set a limit on the amount for payment in a currency

EDIT.PENSION: to Change the limit on the amount of pension payment
EDIT.SOCIAL: to Change the limit on the amount for social security payment
EDIT.MEDICAL: to Change the limit on the amount for medical payment
EDIT.TAX: to Change the limit on the amount of the tax payment
EDIT.SALARY: to Change the limit on the amount of salary payment
EDIT.IN_BETWEEN: Change the amount limit for payments between your accounts
EDIT.CONVERSION: Change the amount limit for currency conversion
EDIT.FOREIGN: Change the amount limit for payment in a currency

MODALS.DESCRIPTION: The user will be able to create payments within the specified amount
MODALS.LABEL: Specify the amount
